title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 105.21 - Real estate expenses
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 105.21 - Real estate expenses

State Regulations

Include: Salaries, wages and other compensation of janitors, caretakers, maintenance men and agents paid in connection with owned real estate. Cost of operating and maintaining owned real estate. Cost of insurance in connection with owned real estate. Cost of advertising in connection with owned real estate. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
105.21

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
